title: Learn To Tie A Tie With The Rabbit And The Fox: Story With Instructional Song
description: "Learn To Tie A Tie With The Rabbit And The Fox" is a cute story with disneyesque, yet thoroughly modern artwork, offering a fun and simple lesson for tying a "school boy knot" in a tie. The last page of the story contains an instructional song. The book and the song are meant to be used together as a family activity where all members follow along with the rabbit and fox as they race through the forest mimicking the motions of tying a tie. This book is for all ages. The song can be heard for free at sybrina.com. Read the book for free on the Goodreads website. The book can not be downloaded to an ereader but it can be read in the web browser while in the Goodreads website. http://www.goodreads.com/reader/34655... If you like it, make sure you come back to this page to recommend it to other Good Reads members. Also, let your friends know that the soft back printed book is available in major book stores (upon request) and at most online book stores immediately.You can also vote for it as the best book for children to learn how to tie, here:http://www.goodreads.com/list/show/30...And if you enjoy Pinterest, check out the "Learn To Tie A Tie With The Rabbit And The Fox" board at http://pinterest.com/sybrinad/learn-t...
author: Sybrina Durant
